The model validator is responsible for assessing the accuracy and appropriateness of the model. They are typically independent of the Model Developer and are responsible for ensuring that the model is fit-for-purpose, accurate, and consistent with the business requirements. They also ensure that the assumptions and limitations of the model are understood and documented.
